name: Scoutman: Save The Jungle
description:
The game idea was taken from Adiwiyata / Go Green in the form of educating school students to better understand, maintain cleanliness and care for the environment.

In this game, the story tells of an adventurer who loves the environment and has a mission to find and clean the environment from garbage hidden in the bush or on the road, and waste from irresponsible people.

The last mission he went through was to catch the mastermind behind the destruction and pollution of forests.

Main Player/Character

Players will walk left or right through a different area in each level, with the mission of finding a way out and looking for trash hidden behind bushes/roads/boxes on each level.

Score

The score is obtained from collecting 3 wastes, namely plastic, bottles or cans.

Obstacle/Enemies

Obstacles and enemies will be different in each level.

Game Over

If the player hits an obstacle, falls into a ravine, or is hit by an enemy, a game over will occur so that it repeats on the current level.

Kamp Kreatif Guru SMK Indonesia (KKGS) 2021

Setyo Bagus Fristanto - SMK Negeri 9 Malang
